Bash(gh release create v1.3.0 --title "v1.3.0 - Recording Stability & Windows Improvements" --notes "$(cat <<''EOF''
## What''s New in v1.3.0

### 🎯 Major Improvements
- **Recording Stability**: Added state locking to prevent rapid toggling issues
- **Windows Pill Visibility**: Dramatically improved pill window visibility on Windows using screen-saver priority level
- **Enhanced Error Handling**: Better error messages and debouncing throughout the recording flow
- **Electron 38.2.0**: Updated to the latest Electron version for improved stability and performance

### 🔧 Changes
- Removed Show/Hide window shortcut for simplified UX (Cmd+Shift+S / Ctrl+Shift+S no longer mapped)
- Improved state management between recording/processing/connecting states
- Better audio blob validation before sending to API
- Fixed pill transparency and visibility issues on Windows
- Enhanced context-specific error messages (API key, rate limits, network errors)

### 🐛 Bug Fixes
- Fixed pill window going behind other windows on Windows OS
- Fixed duplicate recording start/stop commands
- Fixed MediaRecorder error handling
- Improved cleanup on recording errors

### 📦 Installation
Download the appropriate installer for your platform below.

**Windows**: `Voice-to-Text-1.3.0-x64.exe` (installer) or `Voice-to-Text-1.3.0-portable.exe` (portable)
**macOS**: `Voice-to-Text-1.3.0-arm64.dmg` (Apple Silicon) or `Voice-to-Text-1.3.0-x64.dmg` (Intel)
